title: Understanding Data Validation
text: Data validation is a feature in spreadsheets that helps maintain data integrity by restricting the type of data that can be entered into a cell.

title: Why Use Data Validation?
text: Consider scenarios where you need to ensure that only numbers are entered in a column meant for numerical data.

hintAnswer: To ensure that the data entered meets specific criteria and is accurate.
title: Purpose of Data Validation
text: What is the primary purpose of using data validation in a spreadsheet?
choices: To ensure that the data entered meets specific criteria and is accurate.
To automatically format cells based on their content.
To create a backup of the spreadsheet data.
To allow multiple users to edit the spreadsheet simultaneously.
